title: Different Levels for Forums and Actual Account?
body: Is there some sort of difference between your account level and levels needed to post a discussion or comment on things in the forums?

replies.body: Nope, there's no difference.  It's just a syncing situation, which usually happens when posting for the first time.  Your account looks to be sync'd to your boards profile now, so everything looks okay.  Let me know if that's not the case!
